title: [好嬲好嬲] CNN:  民主派初選結果激怒中共

replies.msg:
CNN撰文分析指，早前民主派舉行初選，出人意表獲得逾60萬人投票，比組織者預計的17萬人多出一截，這個數目明顯令在初選舉行前出言威嚇，聲稱屬非法的中共憤怒。

Hong Kong postpones legislative elections over coronavirus fears

//A recent primary election designed to narrow down the number of pro-democracy opposition candidates attracted more than 600,000 votes, far more than the 170,000 or so organizers were hoping for. The turnout attracted the ire of Beijing, however, which suggested the vote was illegally interfering with the upcoming poll //


https://hk.appledaily.com/international/20200731/ITUJ2OB23SDVHUHWSZKE5JZOFA/

https://edition.cnn.com/2020/07/31/asia/hong-kong-election-coronavirus-intl-hnk/index.html
